column5: I recall a thread to basically resolve the issue about fishing within a marina.  Who owns the water and can they legally kick you out if you are fishing from a boat and not bouncing jigs off anything...Basically just being a responsible boater and fisherman and doing no harm.  Any help would be great.  Thanks  Sherriff
Sherriff, is this the one you were looking for ??  http://www.ofncommunity.com/forums/index.p...ic=3302&hl=
